publication.title: Assessing discreet packet-dropping attacks using nearest-neighbor and path-vector attribution
publication.keyword: Mobile Ad Hoc Network;Peer-to-peer Network;Reputation System;Nearest Neighbor;
publication.abstract: Abstractó A Mobile Ad-Hoc Network (MANET) is considered with nodes that may act selshly or maliciously by simply dropping data packets rather than forwarding them. We study a distributed route assessment (reputation) system for a MANET context in which nodes attribute a route’s performance to their nearest neighbors on the route.
